messages: 104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:05): 3aa4c68c2ceb0521f6c25f50e2e0950e, so... the apartment rental for the Oslo meeting:  "Saturday through Thursday" means "arriving Saturday and leaving Thursday" rather than "all nights from Saturday night through Thursday night" ?
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:06): I'm figuring out my flights, I think with the intent of staying a few extra days at the beginning but not at the end.
3aa4c68c2ceb0521f6c25f50e2e0950e (04:07): 104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01: Right.  Saturday night to Wednesday night.
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:07): 3aa4c68c2ceb0521f6c25f50e2e0950e, ok, thanks
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:07): wonders when other people are arriving/leaving
3aa4c68c2ceb0521f6c25f50e2e0950e (04:08): I think several people are arriving saturday, and several are leaving thursday.  Not everyone falls in both camps.
3aa4c68c2ceb0521f6c25f50e2e0950e (04:09): frex, i know 3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d is arriving saturday, but leaving monday the following week
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:09): I added the two itineraries that were sent out to the group meeting page
3aa4c68c2ceb0521f6c25f50e2e0950e (04:09): Where's that page?
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:10): http://www.w3.org/Style/Group/2010/Oslo
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:11): I guess I should list Haakon since he lives there...
3aa4c68c2ceb0521f6c25f50e2e0950e (04:13): Could you include mine?  i'm arriving 10:40 Sat 21st, leaving 12:55 Thu 26th.
3aa4c68c2ceb0521f6c25f50e2e0950e (04:15): danke
3aa4c68c2ceb0521f6c25f50e2e0950e (04:15): And I know Elika's in the apartment for its duration
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:22): yep
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:23): is leaning towards Fri-Thu, perhaps
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:27): offers to cook dinner on Sunday, or thereafter
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:27): will be getting in too late for that on Saturday
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:29): hmmm, some people will be arriving from the webfonts meeting and typecon, looks like...
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:29): oh, but that's in Los Angeles
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:29): I guess it's only befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 who's putting them both on one trip :-)
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:31): dsinger's arriving from elsewhere in Europe, I believe
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:35): 104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01: actually two trips
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:36): befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111, ugh
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:36): mon-fri LA
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:36): sat tokyo
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:36): sun oslo
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:36): weeee
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:37): befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111, so lax->nrt on fri/sat and nrt->osl on sun?
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:38): basically yeah, lax -> nrt is thurs/fri
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:38): then nrt->osl on sun
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:38): so at least you have saturday not on an airplane :-)
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:39): yup
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:39): saturday will be filled with diapers instead
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:40): befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111, Speaking of this, when are you leaving Oslo?  I can add you to the meeting page...
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:40): lemme check
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:40): i fly out fri morn
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:41): everyone else is leaving thurs?
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:41): I'm leaving friday
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:41): so I'll be around on Thursday
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:41): is deciding
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:41): and probably most of Friday
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:41): might do Friday-Friday
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:41): though that would mean two hotel/apartment switches
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:41): heh
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:41): oslo is absolutely lovely in summer
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:42): we might be able to extend the apartment for a day, if that would help
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:42): it'll just be more expensive that day, depending on who else stays longer
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:42): befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111, yes, but summer ends around when we're there :-P
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:42): you mean it starts to get cold?
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:43): befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111, it could, yes.
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:43): ah, will bring some extra clothes then
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:43): befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111, last Oslo F2F was pretty much the same week, in 2003, and highs were in the low-50s F the last few days we were there
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:43): (but in the 70s the day before the meeting)
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:43): ah but we have global warming to thank...
104bc19e5513cba4eba2d18c7a704a01 (04:44): also, http://www.weather.com/weather/tenday/NOXX0029 isn't exactly warm
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:45): dude, that's perfect!!!!!
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:46): it's supposed to get up to 95 tomorrow here in tokyo
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:46): and humid, I imagine
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:46): was there in september, and it was quite humid
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:46): yup
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:46): at least there's no stinky trash that piles up like nyc
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:47): hah
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:47): is getting sleepy
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:47): time for a walk, no?
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:47): an afternoon constitutional
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:47): that might be a good idea
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:47): shift from here to starbucks or something
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:48): have a hot chocolate and try not to fall asleep there...
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:48): there's a park a couple blocks away...
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:48): yeah, but I can't work from there :)
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:48): also it's kinda cold and windy atm
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:49): mmm, cold and windy, mmmm
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:49): wants to finish her proposal for issue 120
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:49): it's a long one
3f21e54c5c5ffd50fe3680acc025bb1d (04:50): packs up, bbiab
befddef7b56a6caf71fa21f2235a8111 (04:51): back to wandering through tryserver logs, looking for acorns
